rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1301}

description: Communication and media skills required by the professional interior architect, including technical communication and documentation, presentation methods and media, and their applications. Lectures cover the range of media, technical and construction drawing, and specification, and briefing document drafting. Demonstrations and exercises focus on skills in 2D and 3D media, and presentation techniques.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
